full_summary:
## RFP for Disk Harrow – Re-tender
### Tender Reference Number: WS4148065222-Doc4441210081

**Tender Status:** This tender has been cancelled.

**Tender Description:**
The Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA) requires the procurement of one (1) Disk Harrow, in accordance with Annex A - Requirements, dated 2024-02-20, and as described in Annex B - Pricing.

**Procurement Details:**
* Tender Closing Date: 2024-03-26, 14:00 EDT
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Regions of Opportunity: None
* Regions of Delivery: Canada
* Contracting Entity: Public Services and Procurement Canada ( PSPC)
* End User Entity: Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA)

**Key Contact Information:**
* Name: Raphael Lafontaine, PSPC
* Email: raphael.lafontaine@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* Notice URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18849450?extsite=MTg4NDk0NTBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

The procurement method for this tender is Competitive – Open Bidding. Bidders will be evaluated based on the Lowest Price principle. Submission of all required supporting documentation and bid submission must be received by 14:00 EDT on 2024-03-26. All bids submitted after this time will be declared non-responsive.

Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and the Buyandsell posting closing time. All bidders should ensure they submit their bids according to the new deadline. Failure to do so may result in the bid being declared non-responsive.

To view the tender details and all the necessary documents, please visit the Notice URL listed above. If you have any questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to contact the key contact person listed above.

Please note that this is a re-tender of the original tender announcement. We appreciate your attention to this matter. We look forward to receiving your bids.  [400 words]
 Format and style as above, but utilize keywords as “Bidder”, “Submission”, “Documents”, “Listed above”, “Tender”, and "Notice URL" as per **official bidding guidelines and neighbouring approved quoting policy efforts.**
